DOC.brief_summary: This multi-center , open-labeled study examine non-inferiority ASP1585 sevelamer hydrochloride chronic kidney disease patient hyperphosphatemia hemodialysis .
DOC.brief_title: A Comparative Study ASP1585 Chronic Kidney Disease Patients With Hyperphosphatemia Hemodialysis
